description.value:
Grandfather Knot
ENTER_FLAVOR_TEXT_HERE
Old Gnarlroot is the elemental force of wood - representing the trees in the forest, unmoving against the oppressive tides and standing vigilant in their duty to protect the forest as a whole. For many naturalists, the trees are seen as sentient beings who have withstood the ages, unflinching and always watching with a wealth of knowledge waiting to be unlocked. Every ship built from timber, every house built of lumber has a story that stretches far beyond what they have seen since their creation - they hold the stories of bloodied battles between wolf and doe and the rustling of a hundred thousand leaves in their boughs. Followers of Old Gnarlroot find themselves often in quiet contemplation and introspection, much like the trees.

Edicts

  • Responsibly use wood to improve both your life and the lives of others
  • Spend time reflecting on your actions
  • Give back what you have taken, as mutual exchange

Anathema

  • Deforestation for sake of destruction
  • Ignoring one's own actions

Areas of Concern

  • Trees in the forest
  • Introspection on one's deeds
  • Duty and hard work

LINK
